attributes.action: Stop creating useless petitions and leave us all alone.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop idiots bombarding us with stupid petitions to put an end to things that are pointless anyway. They are pointless and small, Just do your thing and STFU.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
